EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Starting Now: Is Web-Based EMS Software the Way of the Future?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
TriTech Complimentary Webinar STARTING NOW Is Web-Based EMS Software the Way of the Future?
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=EMS Professional}}, The complimentary live webinar "Is Web-Based EMS Software the Way of the Future?" is starting, please login in now so you don't miss a thing.
Questions? Login Issues: iLinc Support: 800-799-4510 Other Questions: Cheri Lane, TriTech Marketing Communications Manager: cheri.lane@tritech.comÂ
LOGIN DETAILS JOIN LINK: http://tritech.ilinc.com/join/cjfsxxm AUDIO: Listen through your computer speakers or dial in over the telephone to the toll number shown on your screen after login
Trouble logging in? Call 800.799.4510 to reach the iLinc support team for help
TriTech Software Systems 9860 Mesa Rim Road, San Diego, CA 92121 info@tritech.com
